title: National debt of Nigeria in relation to gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2024
yAxis: National debt in relation to GDP
summary: Overall National debt in relation to GDP has increased over the Year.
National debt in relation to GDP is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2022.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum National debt in relation to GDP, about 33.88 was reported at Year 2022
Minimum National debt in relation to GDP about 23.41 was reached at Year 2016
min_summary: In general National debt in relation to GDP has rose over the Year.
National debt in relation to GDP is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2022.
